page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: The 12km. area extends from the villages of Whiston in the north,Treeton in the west,Aughton in the south and Thurcroft in the east. The area is basically rural in character.Several small hamlets are to be found in the area these are Upper Whiston, Guilthwaite and Morthern.In the south of the area is the pretty village of Ulley and close by is the major feature in the area,Ulley Reservoir which offers many recreational possibilities for the visitor. Farming is the main occupation in the area with all the farms being very similar in character. Communications are good,with the M1 passing through the north of the area.
